description: Yuri, an old acquaintance of Ginias and Aina Saharin, is the commander of a Zeon military division in Europe. Though he appears gruff and ill-mannered, Yuri is an honourable soldier who is dedicated to the well-being of the men under his command. After the Odessa base falls to the Federation, Yuri leads his fleeing soldiers east towards Ginias` development base, hoping to use it as an escape route back to space.
name: Yuri Kellerne
